body: How did I missed this smh
a shame this doesnt have as much attention. this doujin is amazing

agreed. simple sex scenes are of course good, but it's nothing in comparison with the former as well as a good character design that you can easily bond with, in addition to appealing dialogue. all combined definitelly creates this magnificent hentai you speak of

Before I was looking for the perfect hentai, I spent months, maybe even years in that search.
